name: SioNo Kids/Yes or No Kids
description:
Its operation is very simple, will be formulating questions and displaying images at the same time in order that you respond affirmatively or negatively as the case may be. To answer each question will have a time limit, if after the time limit has not been successfully associated the question will lose a life and change the image.

Designed and developed in order to entertain and teach the children to differentiate the different elements that are mentioned at each level. To be able to overcome each level will have to answer most questions correctly, this will make children learn that doing things well will always bring good results.

It is expected that the game experience for all children is the best and that with this game that mixes read and concentrate, they can learn something new or reinforce previous knowledge, besides having fun of course. More questions and more images from different categories will be added in the next levels.

Adapted for cell phones and tablets of all screen densities, so that you can live the same experience on any device.

In order for the game experience to be suitable for everyone, suggestions are accepted that can help improve the aspects in which the game is failing. I also invite you to give a rating to the game so that you can continue to develop more content and better quality each time.

Design of images used for levels, logo and banner: "Designed by Freepik"
